DECLARE @D_START_DATE nvarchar(10) ,@D_END_DATE nvarchar(10) SET @D_START_DATE = ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(D, -DAY(#{yyyymmdd}) + 1, #{yyyymmdd}), 112) ) SET @D_END_DATE = ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(s, -1, DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m, 0, #{yyyymmdd}) + 1, 0)), 112) ) SELECT MD.CD_DEPT1 ,MD.NM_DEPT1 ,MD.CD_DEPT2 ,MD.NM_DEPT2 ,MD.CD_DEPT3 ,MD.NM_DEPT3 ,MD.TP_DEPT ,MD.NO_EMP ,MD.NM_KOR ,MD.CD_INCOM ,MD.CD_DUTY_RANK ,MD.PART_MEM_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.WS_BUSINESS_CNT, 0) AS WS_BUSINESS_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.RS_BUSINESS_CNT, 0) AS RS_BUSINESS_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.WS_CNT, 0) AS WS_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.AB_GRADE_CNT + SI.C_GRADE_CNT + SI.NEW_CNT, 0) AS RS_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.AB_GRADE_CNT, 0) AS AB_GRADE_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.C_GRADE_CNT, 0) AS C_GRADE_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.NEW_CNT, 0) AS NEW_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.V_WS_CNT, 0) AS V_WS_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.UNV_WS_CNT, 0) AS UNV_WS_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.V_RS_CNT, 0) AS V_RS_CNT ,ISNULL(SI.UNV_RS_CNT, 0) AS UNV_RS_CNT ,ISNULL(ROUND(WS_CNT / PART_MEM_CNT / #{businessDay}, 1), 0) AS WS_DAY_AVG ,ISNULL(ROUND((AB_GRADE_CNT + C_GRADE_CNT + NEW_CNT) / PART_MEM_CNT / #{businessDay}, 1), 0) AS RS_DAY_AVG FROM (SELECT MD1.CD_COMPANY ,MD1.CD_DEPT AS CD_DEPT1 ,MD1.NM_DEPT AS NM_DEPT1 ,MD2.CD_DEPT AS CD_DEPT2 ,MD2.NM_DEPT AS NM_DEPT2 ,'' AS CD_DEPT3 ,'' AS NM_DEPT3 ,MD2.TP_DEPT ,ME.NO_EMP ,ME.NM_KOR ,ME.CD_INCOM ,ME.CD_DUTY_RANK ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MA_EMP WHERE CD_COMPANY = #{cdCompany} AND CD_DEPT = MD2.CD_DEPT AND CD_INCOM != '099') AS PART_MEM_CNT FROM MA_DEPT MD1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MA_DEPT MD2 ON MD1.CD_DEPT = MD2.H_DEPT AND MD1.CD_COMPANY = MD2.CD_COMPANY LEFT OUTER JOIN MA_EMP ME ON MD2.CD_DEPT = ME.CD_DEPT AND MD2.CD_COMPANY = ME.CD_COMPANY
UNION ALL
SELECT MD1.CD_COMPANY ,MD1.CD_DEPT AS CD_DEPT1 ,MD1.NM_DEPT AS NM_DEPT1 ,MD2.CD_DEPT AS CD_DEPT2 ,MD2.NM_DEPT AS NM_DEPT2 ,MD3.CD_DEPT AS CD_DEPT3 ,MD3.NM_DEPT AS NM_DEPT3 ,MD3.TP_DEPT, ME.NO_EMP ,ME.NM_KOR ,ME.CD_INCOM ,ME.CD_DUTY_RANK ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MA_EMP WHERE CD_COMPANY = #{cdCompany} AND CD_DEPT = MD3.CD_DEPT AND CD_INCOM != '099') AS PART_MEM_CNT FROM MA_DEPT MD1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MA_DEPT MD2 ON MD1.CD_DEPT = MD2.H_DEPT AND MD1.CD_COMPANY = MD2.CD_COMPANY INNER JOIN MA_DEPT MD3 ON MD2.CD_DEPT = MD3.H_DEPT AND MD2.CD_COMPANY = MD3.CD_COMPANY LEFT OUTER JOIN MA_EMP ME ON MD3.CD_DEPT = ME.CD_DEPT AND MD3.CD_COMPANY = ME.CD_COMPANY ) MD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SI.NO_EMP ,(SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT YYYY+MM+DD) FROM SA_Z_BEERK_SALES_INFO WHERE CD_COMPANY = #{cdCompany} AND AIM_TYPE = '04' AND NO_EMP = SI.NO_EMP AND YYYY+MM+DD BETWEEN @D_START_DATE AND @D_END_DATE) AS WS_BUSINESS_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT YYYY+MM+DD) FROM SA_Z_BEERK_SALES_INFO WHERE CD_COMPANY = #{cdCompany} AND (AIM_TYPE = '02' OR AIM_TYPE = '05') AND NO_EMP = SI.NO_EMP AND YYYY+MM+DD BETWEEN @D_START_DATE AND @D_END_DATE) AS RS_BUSINESS_CNT ,COUNT(CASE WHEN SI.AIM_TYPE = '04' THEN 1 END) AS WS_CNT ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RS.STATUS = '00' AND (RS.GRADE = 'LV01' OR RS.GRADE = 'LV02') THEN 1 END) AS AB_GRADE_CNT ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RS.STATUS = '00' AND ((RS.GRADE != 'LV01' AND RS.GRADE != 'LV02') OR RS.GRADE IS NULL) THEN 1 END) AS C_GRADE_CNT ,COUNT(CASE WHEN SI.AIM_TYPE = '02' THEN 1 END) AS NEW_CNT ,COUNT(CASE WHEN SI.ACT_END_YN = 'Y' AND MPA.STORE_TYPE1 = '01' THEN 1 END ) AS V_WS_CNT ,COUNT(CASE WHEN SI.ACT_END_YN = 'N' AND MPA.STORE_TYPE1 = '01' THEN 1 END ) AS UNV_WS_CNT ,COUNT(CASE WHEN SI.ACT_END_YN = 'Y' AND (RS.STORE_TYPE1 = '02' OR RS.STORE_TYPE1 = '03') THEN 1 END ) AS V_RS_CNT ,COUNT(CASE WHEN SI.ACT_END_YN = 'N' AND (RS.STORE_TYPE1 = '02' OR RS.STORE_TYPE1 = '03') THEN 1 END ) AS UNV_RS_CNT FROM SA_Z_BEERK_SALES_INFO SI LEFT OUTER JOIN SA_Z_BEERK_RETAIL_STORE RS ON SI.CD_RETAIL = RS.CD_RETAIL AND SI.CD_COMPANY = RS.CD_COMPANY AND RS.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN SA_Z_BEERK_MA_PARTNER_ADD MPA ON SI.CD_PARTNER = MPA.CD_PARTNER AND SI.CD_COMPANY = MPA.CD_COMPANY WHERE SI.CD_COMPANY = #{cdCompany} AND YYYY+MM+DD BETWEEN @D_START_DATE AND @D_END_DATE GROUP BY SI.NO_EMP) SI ON MD.NO_EMP = SI.NO_EMP
WHERE (MD.CD_DEPT1 = #{cdDept1} OR (MD.CD_DEPT2 = #{cdDept1} AND MD.CD_DUTY_RANK = '120')) AND MD.CD_COMPANY = #{cdCompany} AND MD.CD_INCOM != '099'
AND MD.NO_EMP = #{noEmp}
AND (CD_DEPT1 IN (${cdDept}) OR CD_DEPT2 IN (${cdDept}) OR CD_DEPT3 IN (${cdDept}))
ORDER BY MD.CD_DEPT1, MD.CD_DEPT2, MD.CD_DEPT3
